title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for correctly finding f′(x)

f(x)= x 3 −6 x 2 +p f ′ (x)=3 x 2 −12x=0

1 point is earned for correctly solving f′(x) = 0

3x(x − 4) = 0

x = 0, x = 4

1 point is earned for correctly indicating the location of a maximum and a minimum, with analysis

0/1 if explicitly chooses to work only with a specific value for p

f′(x) changes sign from positive to negative at x = 0

f′(x) changes sign from negative to positive at x = 4

or

f″(x) = 6x − 12, f″(0)= −12, f″(4) = 12

1 point is earned for correctly finding the maximum and minimum values in terms of p

relative maximum at x = 0, f(0) = p

relative minimum at x = 4, f(4) = p − 32

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct upper bound

1 point is earned for the correct lower bound

<-1> including 0 or 32, or both

f(x) has three distinct real roots when p > 0 and p − 32 < 0,

so 0 < p < 32

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
2 points are earned for the average value where 1 point is earned for the correct integrand and limits and 1 point is earned for the appropriate constant for definite integral

1 point is earned for correctly setting average value equal to 1 and solving for p where the equation must be of the form k ∫ −1 2 ( x 3 −6 x 2 +p)dx =1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbiqaaWPeqaaaaa aaaaWdbiaadUgadaWdXaqaaiaacIcacaWG4bWdamaaCaaaleqabaWd biaaiodaaaGccqGHsislcaaI2aGaamiEa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qaca aIYaaaaOGaey4kaSIaamiCaiaacMcacaWGKbGaamiEaaWcbaGaeyOe I0IaaGymaaqaaiaaikdaa0Gaey4kIipakiabg2da9iaaigdaaaa@48F1@
